body: Hi, i'm David. I've played on Avicus for a while now but didn't know that it had a forum until recently. I just wanted to introduce myself and say hi to all of the members of the forum and let everyone know that the player report section is about to get spammed with all of the new threads (from me :D). I have noticed a lot of hacking client users on the server lately and how they can be very annoying to the innocent players who just want to have fun. I plan to rid of these players from the server and scare future players from hacking or using hacks. I think the odds of winning should be even between players instead of being unbalanced. I would be grateful if a few individuals would help me to reach my goal.

title: Hello

replies.body: Hello welcome to Avicus! Enjoy your stay and anything you need help with feel free to contact me on skype at b.banno321!
replies.body_tagged: Hello welcome to Avicus! Enjoy your stay and anything you need help with feel free to contact me on skype at b.banno321!

replies.body:
Welcome to the forums! It's great knowing you feel that hacking is completely wrong and you want to report it, because I including many others feel the same way.

EDIT: I just realized your name is the best ever xD

replies.body:
So... I heard rumors that there was another David around here... those rumors also told me that he loves bacon faaar more than I do. How dare he come and undercut my bacon-loving madness?!

Lol, just kidding! Welcome to the Avicus Network, glad to meet you! :D
